title: League Wont Launch After Clicking LAunch
body: So I've been having this problem since the beginning of season 6 and every time i click launch the launch icon turns gray but then turns back to orange and doesn't launch league and stays on the league launcher screen. I need help and i have tried multiple things that have not helped.

replies.body:
I've seen this issue in the past and it's usually been linked to an *unstable connection* to our login servers. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will walk you through configuring your local network settings so they're 100% compatible with League. If you still encounter this issue after those changes, just let me know so we can troubleshoot this further.

Best of luck!
If anyone that sees this that has a solution please let me now.
